choices: a taxi waiting to take you wherever you want to go
1.content: you have just arrived at the airport in Tennessee, where carrie underwood lives, and you walk out the front of the airport to find...
1.title: getting off the plane

11.content: you walk over and greet yourself. "hi im David." she smirks and says "im carrie, wanna ride?" you eagerly jump in to the car without a second thought. "to my house driver." says carrie. you look down and notice she is wearing ugg boots. she catches you and says "sorry, ive been a little under the weather, im all better now but didnt give myself time to get around." thats fine with you. after the half hour ride you two decide to just stay at her place for the rest of the day. You arrive at her house and after she gives you the tour she complains her feet hurt. "i can give you a foot massage if you'd like." you tell her. " that would be great" she says. you follow her into her living room and she sits down and you get on the floor in front of her. she puts her right boot in your lap and as you grab on to it and start to take it off she pulls it away and says "maybe this isnt a good idea. my feet probably stink." you reply fast "thats ok. i dont mind." she smiles and puts her foot back and you take off her boot and realize...
11.title: the ride to her house

111.content: you can smell her feet a little, not bad. you reach over and take the other boot off. you grab her left foot and start massaging but her socks make it difficult to do a good job. so you ask if you can take them off. "if you want but then my feet will really smell." she says. "i doubt it." you reply " watch" you take both her socks off to reveal her bare feet and metallic pink toes. you wad up both her socks and push them against your nose and take a deep breath in. "that doesn't stink?" she asks "not to me" you reply. "do you mind if i do something else to your feet?" you ask. "like what?" replies carrie
111.title: the massage

1111.content: "can i smell them?" you ask "if you want, i don't mind." you grab both her feet and put them up to your face and start breathing in the scent of her feet. they feel good on your face and the scent from between her feet smells good. then you move up and smell between her toes. she wiggles her toes as you smell. then you start...
1111.title: smelling her feet

11112.content: you go straight into sucking her toes. she is a little shocked at first but then soothed by the feeling as you put each toe in your mouth individually. then you start licking between her cute pink toes and she starts curling her toes. you let go of her left foot and focus on the toes on her right foot. she seems to be enjoying this but you feel its time to change it up a little. so next you
11112.title: sucking her toes

112.content: after taking her boot off you see her barefoot with perfectly pedicured metallic blue toes. you reach over and take the other boot off. "doesnt that stink?" she asks "no, i dont smell anything" she lifts her foot up and presses her toes against your nose. "how bout now?" "still don't smell anything" you reply "can i taste them?" you ask "go ahead, they probably dont taste that good but if you want to, i wont stop ya." she replies
112.title: shes barefoot

info.brief_description: you won a trip to hang out with your favorite celebrity carrie underwood and had some fun
info.description: please keep it about feet. no shrinking, cloning or other related things.
